name: קאָנטראָל
description:
A game made entirely in 48 hours for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam!

קאָנטראָל is an abstract game about "you".

The game takes place in your mind where you play as your consciousness. Your job is to fight off bad memories, nightmares, and thoughts before they take control of you and consume you entirely.

  • Endless shoot-em-up with hoards of enemy waves and teeth-gritting difficulty
  • A beautiful soundtrack, created all within the time of the jam
  • Lovely pixel art, created all within the time of the jam
  • Different types of enemies, to keep you on your toes
  • Upgrades to keep you engaged in your endless battle against anxiety

[Arrow Keys, WASD] - Move Player

[Mouse] - Aim And Shoot

Useful info:

-White rectangles are for health

-Blue shards are for speed

-Red rings are for defense

-Red X's are for damage

Windows: Unpackage the zip and run the .exe

---------------------------------------

Linux/Ubuntu Based Distros: See readme.txt
